A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a disaster of a film.  It has ruined the franchise and retroactively made previous films worse.  I wish Disney had never bought Star Wars and want George Lucas to take it back.  I wish Kathleen Kennedy\, Rian Johnson and the entire story group in charge of this travesty were never born.\n\nStar Wars is now dead to me and I will NEVER see another Star Wars film.
